Topic.Title: COME PLAY MY GAME BASED ON THE FALLOUT GAMES!

Posts.EditableText:
I am working on a game based on the fallout series so if you play those games come try it or if not come play it anyways. Or die tonight thanks:)

http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/tzzzq7m7t0e1t1skktbodg/vault-3

Posts.EditableText:
5 stars:
NICE START!!!
(even a bit spooky...)
Typos, but you know that...
When I turn on the radio, can you leave the music playing after "leaving the radio"?
Then, later have the option to change music or turn off the radio.

Attack guards:
option 1, option 2... no text.

Idea:
At the start of the game:
It is Friday, October 22, 2077, 3:45 PM...
I like the "future" back story beginning... Nice touch.
Nice work with the background music and sound effects!
